code: import React from'react';import InvoicePage from'./components/InvoicePage';function App(){var savedInvoice=window.localStorage.getItem('invoiceData');var data=null;try{if(savedInvoice){data=JSON.parse(savedInvoice);}}catch(_e){}var onInvoiceUpdated=function onInvoiceUpdated(invoice){window.localStorage.setItem('invoiceData',JSON.stringify(invoice));};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"app"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{className:"center fs-30"},"React Invoice Generator"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(InvoicePage,{data:data,onChange:onInvoiceUpdated}));}export default App;
